reviewText: It was PAL format- I am sure I checked that it was formatted for USA players.
People should be blocked from selling DVD that won't play here...  Bull and a waste of $$

I bought this in lieu of believing that it would play, and as everyone else has encountered i sadly can not, i got this for me ma for her birthday, and so i must scramble to find a replacement sweet. so i advise anyone outside the uk, to read these reviews before purchase.

I am sure I would have liked it, as I love Billy C, but when I received it, it wouldn't play because it was not the correct region, which I was not aware of before I purchased it, so I send it to a friend in Wales as a gift. She loves it. Would love to have watched it, but..................

I was unaware of regional formats of DVDs upon the my purchase, and the product was shipped by the time that I learned. I small email to the seller and they gladly gave a partical discount.
I thank them immensely for their kindness!!

Anyway, this performance is the greatest! Obviously, those who are familiar with B.C.'s work knows that he swears, and talks a little bit about sex. Keeping that in mind, his comedy is rooted in story-telling of his life, and other happening, including his family, travels, love of the opera, among other things. I recommend this special to anyone that likes a funny story, and doesn't mind a little Scottish vulgarity. Just check to make sure where you purchase this DVD is also where you live, or you have a player that runs DVDs of the same region.

Also, as a side note, Billy's hair is long on the cover, but cut short in the video.
